programme.title: Fear Factor 2.0
programme.desc: 'The Bees Are So Angry, Part 2" - Five teams of two compete for $100,000 dollars on a five stunt, 2 hour spectacular as they are flown underneath the belly of a helicopter, have to eat bees, are launched off a building through glass, deal with the horror of bull testicles and drive a car through the back of a moving semi truck.

programme.title: Fear Factor 2.0
programme.desc: 'Leeches & Shaved Heads & Tear Gas, Part 1" - In a special 2 hour Fear Factor five teams of 2 are bungied off a cliff while tied under a helicopter, must eat leeches, must run through a burning building, deal with the Wheel of Misfortune, and finally grab flags off a moving car while dangling of a crane. All is the hopes of winning $100,000.

programme.title: Fear Factor 2.0
programme.desc: 'Leeches & Shaved Heads & Tear Gas, Part 2" - In a special 2 hour Fear Factor five teams of 2 are bungied off a cliff while tied under a helicopter, must eat leeches, must run through a burning building, deal with the Wheel of Misfortune, and finally grab flags off a moving car while dangling of a crane. All is the hopes of winning $100,000.

programme.title: Fear Factor 2.0
programme.desc: "Snake Bite" - Four couples compete for a grand prize of $50,000. In order to win they must face getting catapulted off the top of a tall building, transfer snakes with theirs mouths and transfers flags to a partner hanging under a helicopter, all while riding a personal watercraft.

programme.title: Fear Factor 2.0
programme.desc: "Roach Coach" - Four teams of two compete for $50,000 as they are locked in a cage and sunk underwater, eat a disgusting meal from the Fear Factor Roach Coach consisting of roaches, grasshoppers, blood salsa and maggots and lastly must leap back and forth from a moving station wagon onto a bus.

programme.title: Fear Factor 2.0
programme.desc: "Broken Hearts & Blood Baths" - Four teams of exes must deal with 3 stunts and each other. In order to win $50,000 they must launch a car into a lake while being strapped in, dive for cow hearts in thousands of gallons of blood, and deal with the most difficult Fear Factor stunt ever as they run, fly, swim and climb while trying to blow up a fueling station.

programme.title: Fear Factor 2.0
programme.desc: "Tall Crappacino" - Four teams of two attempt to win $50,000. They face three extreme stunts as they are stuck in a car being flown under two helicopters, must drink a Fear Factor Crappacino and lastly are dropped through a collapsing tower.

programme.title: Fear Factor 2.0
programme.desc: "Scorpion Tales" - Four teams of family members compete for $50,000 as they careen into a quarry full of live ammunition while in the back of a truck, must devour nasty scorpions, and are strapped to the front of a cement truck as it smashes through structures.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Descender Jump, Eat Sheep's Eye, Water Tank" - Contestants are asked to jump from a 12th floor window in a hotel underwater challenge.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Dog Attack, Snake Pit, Beam Walk" - Contestants brave a dog attack, submerge themselves in a tank full of snakes and traverse a beam 100 feet in the air.

programme.title: Here's Not Here
programme.desc: This episode introduces a new face to the show. With all that's gone on in the apocalypse, can people be trusted? Better yet, can they change?

programme.title: Now
programme.desc: The mood in Alexandria is quite grim after a number of setbacks. This might prove too much for the sheltered citizens inside the gates.

programme.title: Always Accountable
programme.desc: Daryl, Abraham, and Sasha run into multiple obstacles, including a new threat, while trying to return to Alexandria after a mission.

programme.title: Heads Up
programme.desc: Alexandria is finally able to start pulling itself back together. With that, there's peace between our group and the Alexandrians. But for how long?

programme.title: Start to Finish
programme.desc: After having a few moments of peace, trouble finds its way to Alexandria yet again. Only this time, the threat might be too big to defeat.

programme.title: No Way Out
programme.desc: With walkers inside the gates of Alexandria, Rick and the group are scared, outnumbered, and things are only getting worse.

programme.title: My New York
programme.desc: Norman rides around his home city of New York while visiting friends, eating pizza with Mario Batali, and exploring the city's art, food, and culture.

programme.title: Bottomless Brunch at Colman's: Volume 4
programme.desc: Join Fear the Walking Dead Star Colman Domingo as he virtually welcomes guests to enjoy a cocktail and a decadent brunch.

programme.title: Start to Finish
programme.desc: After having a few moments of peace, trouble finds its way to Alexandria yet again. Only this time, the threat might be too big to defeat.

programme.title: Sinbad And The War Of The Furies
programme.desc: On a treasure hunt gone wrong, modern-day adventurer Sinbad accidentally releases the Furies, three beautiful but terrible ancient beings powerful enough to threaten life on Earth.

programme.title: Sinister Squad
programme.desc: When a violent supernatural cult known as Death's Messengers reigns terror on Earth, a team of malevolent storybook villains is coerced into fighting in the modern world, but these baddies must learn to keep their true wickedness at bay if they want any chance at freedom.

programme.title: Titanic II
programme.desc: On the 100th anniversary of the original voyage, a modern luxury liner christened "Titanic II," follows the path of its namesake. But when a tsunami hurls an ice berg into the new ship's path, the passengers and crew must fight to avoid a similar fate.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Astronomer George Herbert (C. Thomas Howell) is assigned to investigate reports of strange meteors crashing into earth near New York, Los Angeles and Washington, D.C. As the meteors land, enormous multi-limbed metal creatures disembark and begin destroying everything and everyone in their path with heat-ray guns. Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.

programme.title: 40 Days and Nights
programme.desc: When a colossal tectonic shift causes the sea level to start rising, a microbiologist gathers the DNA of as many species as she can, while the military creates an "ark" in a desperate attempt to preserve life on Earth.

programme.title: Android Cop
programme.desc: In this futuristic, action-packed thriller, a cop and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by a disease-stricken populace. Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness - with the help of the machine's powerful technology and weaponry.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An investigation into the murder of a World War II veteran slowed to a halt when the prime suspect had a solid alibi. But a lucky break led to a shady character who wore distinctive boots.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman who was known to have suffered from depression took her own life. But her sister told police that she said if anything were to happen to her there would be a note in the china cabinet.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When an off-duty policeman was shot dead, his fellow officers were determined to solve the crime. They needed clues to find the killer and they discovered them in tiny fibres and an asthma inhaler.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: One warm summer afternoon, the town of Verona, Wisconsin faced its first triple homicide. To solve the case, investigators had to delve into the world of high rollers and offshore betting.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The body of a young girl was discovered on isolated farmland near Delano, California. She had no ID, but police found mailbox keys in the pocket of her jeans.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The medical examiner ruled the death an accident, but the detectives investigating the case thought the evidence at the scene indicated otherwise.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a hit-and-run boating accident caused the death of a popular young man, investigators faced the daunting task of searching for one boat among 1200 others.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman was found dead on the bedroom floor of her apartment. The crime scene yielded little of value and investigators wondered if they would find enough evidence to make a case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young man was killed in a mysterious car crash, but the evidence at the scene led investigators to believe it was not an accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1993, 82-year-old Kathryn Bishop was found dead in her Pennsylvania home. Tiny clues on the victim's body would tell police what happened that night.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A wealthy man and his wife were attacked by three masked men outside their luxurious Louisiana home. He was shot dead and she was forced to open their hidden safe.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A bomb, constructed to cause as much damage as possible, kills a victim with deadly force and flame. When a search yields some tiny clues, police are able to identify the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When the number and volume of bloodstains at the scene was greater than usual, it was up to forensic scientists to find out why.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The wife of a respected police officer was murdered in her own home. The crime went unsolved for more than a decade, until a newly formed cold case unit took a fresh look at the evidence.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The victim had ingested a massive amount of cyanide. An unlikely clue - a flaw on a mailing envelope - exposed a murderer who was willing to kill innocent people.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: They thought the fire would cover their crime. But one tiny clue, no bigger than a thumbtack, remained. It held all the information investigators needed to put a trio of killers behind bars.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1987, the death of Crystal Purcell was considered an accident. Then in 2001, Barbara Purcell called police to suggest that her estranged husband had killed Crystal.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Paul Gruber's daughter suspected something was wrong when she received birthday cards addressed from her father, but written in a stranger's handwriting.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Sketching with Sharks" - Underwater marine life provides inspiration for avant-garde fashion. But which designer doubles the budget by swimming with the sharks?

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Versatile Tops and Bottoms" - Alyssa and the judges take over Times Square to school the designers in the business of fashion for a QVC Separates Challenge.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Some Like It Hot Dog" - Marilyn Monroe's timeless beauty inspires dazzling red carpet gowns. And a Hollywood legend pays a special visit to the workroom.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars

programme.desc: "A Little Bit Country, A Little Bit Rock n' Roll" - Country music supergroup Little Big Town team up the designers to create "opposites attract" red carpet gowns for the Academy of Country Music Awards.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Fashion 911" - In the notorious Unconventional Materials Challenge, designers turn NYC emergency services materials into runway worthy looks. Johnny Wujek guest judges.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Birthday Suits" - A totally naked runway introduces the designers to naturists who need winter wear to stay warm.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Going for Baroque" - Designers create couture-inspired gowns that celebrate Baroque fashion. Marchesa's Keren Craig and supermodel Coco Rocha guest judge.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Once Upon a Runway" - Broadway's Finding Neverland star tasks the designers to reimagine modern looks for classic fairytale characters. Kesha and Brad Goreski guest judge.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "A Touch of Style" - Sports and fashion combine as designers create high-end ath-leisure wear inspired by the "Touch by Alyssa Milano" line. Kristin Cavallari guests.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation:White Wedding, Pt. 1
programme.desc: Emma Nelson is reveling in her newest job as her mom's maid of honour and planner extraordinaire! Her mom, Spike, is marrying her high-school crush, Snake - who also just happens to be Emma's favourite teacher.

programme.desc: When Spike reveals the identity of the mystery man she's been dating, Emma is shocked. Mr. Simpson - her teacher! Emma claims she’s okay with it, but if that’s true, why is suddenly being so rude to Mr. Simpson?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation:Karma Chameleon
programme.desc: Ashley feels like an outcast. Nobody's willing to forget how she treated them at her party last year. Ash decides to take action, swallows her pride and apologizes to everyone. And it works. She boasts to Terri about her success- it’s like last year never happened!

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation:Weird Science
programme.desc: It's Science Fair time at Degrassi. Emma’s a serious contender for first prize, but when the results of her experiment don't fall in line with her hypothesis, she's in a panic.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation:Shout, Pt. 2
programme.desc: Haunted by memories of her recent sexual assault, Paige is desperately trying to appear normal. A girl band contest sounds like a great distraction. Terri wants to reunite PMS—including Ashley. Paige refuses, and recruits Hazel instead.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Popcorn'' - Brandon rescues Popcorn, a loveable English Bulldog saddled with a history of neglect. He's found a nurturing new owner in Simone, but can this out of shape bulldog keep up with her active lifestyle?

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Jasmine'' - Jasmine, the short haired pointer, was surrendered because of a tragic injury that takes thousands of dollars to fix. Can Brandon get Jasmine the care she needs and then find her the perfect home?

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Best of: Ultimate Tests'' - From climbing a mountain to resisting temptation to swimming for safety,every dog that Brandon rescues has a unique set of challenges. And success will mean that they are ready for their new families.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Sadie'' - Brandon faces one of his biggest challenges yet. He must find the perfect shelter dog to assist a woman with very special needs. And he'll have to devise a new form of training in order to make the match successful.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Chance'' - From red collar to white collar! Marketing Executive Christina wants to adopt a puppy she can take to her office. But if Chance, the Pointer Mix, wants to join the work force, he'll need to learn "get to work" on potty training.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Cora'' - Cora, an eight-year-old Doberman mix, gets a new shot at life when potential owner, Nikki, decides to adopt a senior dog. But will Cora be able to shed a lifetime of bad habits to make way for a new talent?

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Shadow'' - Living alone for the first time in fifty years, retiree Gary seeks out a new companion in Shadow, a one-year old Chihuahua mix. But before they can make new memories together, Shadow must learn to put aside the trust issues of his past.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Pluto'' - We're blasting off! Brandon rescues Pluto, a Tibetan terrier mix with gravity defying energy. But will Pluto's marking habit ground the adoption process before it can launch?

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Overcoming Obstacles'' - Age. Experience. Physical limitation. Every dog faces its own unique hurdles in training. But with Brandon's guidance, they're all capable of achieving new heights.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Sandy'' - A golden retriever answers the call of duty for a wounded warrior who's in need. But to earn his service dog badge, Sandy must successfully complete Brandon's boot camp.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Biscuit'' - A debilitating skin condition leaves a French bulldog mix with little hope for adoption, until an eleventh hour save gives him another shot at life. But will the family pool sink Biscuit's chance at a forever home?

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Rosie'' - Brandon helps turn a ten-month-old poodle mix into a therapy dog for a cancer survivor who's hoping to pay it forward. But, can managing one of life's most difficult challenges prepare Lori for the job of handling Rosie?

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Wilson'' - Lights, camera, action! An LA-based photographer sets his sights on finding the perfect mascot for his photography business. But if Wilson, the two-year old Lhasa Apso mix, wants to book the job, he'll need to channel his inner supermodel.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Brando'' - Brando, the nine-month-old Rottweiler mix, gets a job offer he can't refuse. But preparing this eighty-pound puppy for office life could spell disaster.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Transformation'' - From makeovers to mindsets —every Lucky Dog goes through its own unique metamorphosis. Today we look back at some of this season's most dramatic, and heartwarming, "transformations."

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Toto'' - There's no place like home! A West Highland terrier mix catches the eye of a loving family looking to adopt their first dog. But will Toto's severe reaction to leashes jeopardize his storybook ending?

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Grover'' - Diamond in the Ruff! Grover, the two-year-old Poodle mix, might just be the perfect gem for an antique jewelry dealer looking for a new companion. But his deep-seated abandonment issues threaten to smudge his chance at a forever home.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Junior'' - Dance Fever! After the sudden passing of his former companion, a retired vet hopes a six-month old Chihuahua mix will mend his broken heart. But when Junior's lack of motivation proves problematic, Brandon relies on his "bag of tricks" for inspiration.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Groot'' - Follow the leader! When a submissive Dachshund mix proves difficult to train, Brandon seeks out additional assistance—and finds it in the paws of another trainer.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Stark'' - Hoping to incorporate a new dog into their upcoming nuptials, Niki and Vien set their sights on a one-year-old Lhasa Apso mix named Stark. But before Stark can say "I do" to his new life, he'll need to stop objecting to his training.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''One Step at a Time'' - Every dog has its day... but training them takes a lot longer. Whether it's busting bad habits or cultivating news skills, true results require patience, consistency and above all else, taking it "one step at a time."

programme.title: Sean Evans and Farideh Sadeghin Taste Test Chicago Deep Dish Made by Two New Yorkers | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Can two thin-crust loving New Yorkers make deep dish pizza fit for a Chicago native? As host Nicole Russell continues her quest to become the world's next master pizza maker she must face off against Josephine Giordano of Lenny's Pizza to see if she can conquer the Windy City's most controversial culinary export. Will Nicole's chicken parm-packed deep dish be enough to the win the favor of Muchies' Farideh Sadeghin and Chicago native Sean Evans?

programme.title: The Perfect Detroit-Style Pizza with Cliff Skighwalker, Adam Richman, and Reina Scully | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Detroit is home to some of America's most delicious pizza. But who can create the ultimate Motor City-inspired slice? As host Nicole Russell continues her quest to become the world's next master pizza-maker, she must face off against chef Cliff Skighwalker in a good ol' fashioned pan-pizza throwdown.

programme.title: Mythical Chef Josh and Nicole Russell Make Taco Bell and Beef Patty Inspired Pizzas | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Pizza is the ultimate blank canvas for culinary innovation. In this episode of Pizza Wars, host Nicole Russell faces off against Mythical Chef Josh to see who can create the ultimate "mashup pie." At Mythical Kitchen, Josh has perfected the art of fast-food fusion, but will his Doritos Locos Taco Pizza be enough to take down Nicole's Jamaican beef patty-inspired pie? The choice is up to this week's judges: Complex's Speedy Morman and chef Jae Lee of Nowon in NYC.

programme.title: Neapolitan-Style Pizza at Home with Vito Iacopelli, Nicole Russell, and Daym Drops | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: It's the season finale of Pizza Wars, and host Nicole Russell must now battle the final boss: master pizzaiolo Vito Iacopelli. Will Nicole's tandoori-inspired pizza be enough to impress food review legend Daym Drops, or will Vito's "connolo-style" slice steal the golden pizza trophy away from her for good? Only one oven can handle a pizza cage match of this magnitude: The Ooni Koda 16. Tune in to a very special episode of Pizza Wars to see who comes out on top.

programme.title: Maluma Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Global Colombian superstar Maluma goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Flight Club in Miami and talks about his love for the Nike Mags, meeting Virgil Abloh, and seeing his grandfather's appreciation for New Balance.

programme.title: Sean Evans Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Hot Ones host Sean Evans goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Stadium Goods in New York City and talks about his favorite sneakers growing up, getting his own Reebok collaboration, and some of his trademark sneakers.

programme.title: Noah Beck Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: TikTok star Noah Beck goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Cookies N' Kicks in Los Angeles and talks about how he got into Air Force 1s, who had the best sneakers in the Sway House, and his girlfriend Dixie D'Amelio ruining a pair of Off-White x Air Jordan IVs.

programme.title: Moneybagg Yo Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Moneybagg Yo goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Stadium Goods in New York City and talks about his mom working for Nike in Memphis, winning dice games to get money for sneakers, and his crazy sneaker collection.

programme.title: Soulja Boy Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Soulja Boy goes Sneaker Shopping at SoleStage in Los Angeles and talks about being the rapper who started the Bape trend, being the first rapper to wear Nike Mags, buying Kanye West's Louis Vuitton sneakers in Cancun, and how lucrative his Yums sneaker deal was.

programme.title: Pharrell Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Pharrell Williams goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at The Webster in Miami and talks about Nigo giving him Bape sneakers, why his Ice Cream sneakers were blurred out of the "Drop It Like It's Hot" video, his sneaker history, and Adidas collaborations, and more.

programme.title: Karol G Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Multi-platinum reggaeton artist Karol G joins Complex's Joe La Puma at Flight Club in New York City to talk about getting Air Force 1s while growing up in Colombia, why she loves Air Jordan 4s, and why she thinks J Balvin's Air Jordan 1s are important.

programme.title: Michael Strahan Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: NFL Hall of Famer Michael Strahan goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Stadium Goods for the Season 12 finale and talks about getting Air Jordans 1s in 1985, sitting front row at Kanye West's Yeezy Season fashion show, and his viral prank of getting his teeth fixed.

programme.title: Rod Wave Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Multi-platinum artist Rod Wave goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Kickzr4us in Tampa, Florida, and talks about his latest album, giving away Air Jordans, and his favorite Nike SB Dunks.

programme.title: Rowdy Rebel Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Rowdy Rebel joins Complex's Joe La Puma at Stadium Goods in New York City and talks about his favorite Air Jordans, wearing Off-White x Air Jordan 1s when he went home, and wanting to go shopping with Bobby Shmurda in the future.

programme.title: G Herbo Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: G Herbo goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Stadium Goods in New York City and talks about how he used to clean sneakers growing up, camping out for shoes, and why he loves Air Force 1s so much.

programme.title: An Open Conversation about Kanye West
programme.desc: On this episode Complex staffers, Khal and Jinx, weigh in on Kanye's media takeover, from his interview with Charlamagne Tha God, his appearance on TMZ, and his current state of mind.

programme.title: Joji Judges a Boba Tea Battle Between Rich Brian and NIKI
programme.desc: Boba is one of the world's most beloved beverages. But what happens when NIKI and Rich Brian decide to trick out their drinks with some crazy toppings? After learning the bubble-tea basics from Boba Guys founder Bin Chen, NIKI and Brian go head-to-head in the boba battle of the century. Gummy bears? Check. Gushers? Check. Pop Rocks? Check! The only thing keeping NIKI and Brian from achieving bubble tea perfection is the limits of their own imaginations.

programme.title: Joji and Rich Brian Make International Burgers with Chef Ludo
programme.desc: Last year, chef Ludo Lefebvre taught Joji and Rich Brian how to make the perfect omelet. But can the boys finally impress their mentor by serving him a couple of tasty burgers? After learning the secrets behind Le Big Mec-Ludo's legendary French-twist on a double cheeseburger-Brian and Joji go head-to-head in an international burger battle for the ages. Which burger will Ludo choose: Brian's satay-and-sambal-slathered creation, or Joji's teriyaki-and-shrimp-topped monstrosity?

programme.title: NIKI and Inga Lam Share Indomie Noodle Hacks
programme.desc: Indomie is one of Indonesia's most beloved cultural exports. But what happens when you use mie goreng to make burgers and chocolate bars? Indonesian icon NIKI has been an Indomie purist since day one, but today she's teaming up with BuzzFeed's Inga Lam in the hopes of broadening her stir-fried noodle horizons. Together, NIKI and Ingra run through a few of their favorite ways to trick out a pack of instant noodles. Which mie goreng metamorphosis is NIKI's favorite?

programme.title: The Ultimate Regional Burger Road Trip with a Burger Scholar
programme.desc: Burger Scholar George Motz and Alvin Cailan are going on the ultimate regional burger road trip-which includes a pit stop to eat America's original hamburger. Motz is a veteran road warrior: he's logged thousands of miles in his car chasing down burgers all over the country.

programme.title: South LA's African American Taco Movement
programme.desc: Miss Info meets a group of young, charismatic African-American entrepreneurs from Watts, South L.A, and Compton who are shaking up the taco scene, finding new meaning in L.A.'s iconic street food. Find out how upstarts like All Flavor No Grease and Taco Mell are making a name for themselves, and why rapper Casey Veggies says, "The food game turned into the rap game."

programme.title: How New Orleans Birthed a Vietnamese Po Boy Movement
programme.desc: We head to New Orleans. Forty years ago, Vietnamese migration to NOLA introduced bánh mì to po' boy country. Now, the lines between two iconic sandwiches are blurring. To find out what happens when you mash up the Mississippi Delta and the Mekong Delta, we spoke to New Orleans legend Curren$y, Times-Picayune writer Brett Anderson, and Banh Mi Boys chef Peter Nguyen.

programme.title: Filipino Food 101 With Jo Koy
programme.desc: When it came time for Sean Evans to dive head first into the menu at Jeepney Filipino Gastropub in NYC, the choice for a dinner companion was a no-brainer.

programme.title: Mike Chen and Claire Saffitz Explore Japanese Street Food and Candy
programme.desc: Japan Village is a 20,000-square-foot food hall in Brooklyn's Industry City, and Reina Scully is ready to explore every corner. But no food tour is complete without a few friends. Joining Reina on her adventure is Strictly Dumpling's Mike Chen, Bon Appétit's Claire Saffitz, and NYC restaurateur Sakura Yagi.

programme.title: Wagyu 101 with Sean Evans and Philip DeFranco
programme.desc: Japan is home to some of the world's most coveted cuts of meat. But what makes wagyu so expensive? From an $85 wagyu sando with Hot Ones host Sean Evans, to a $350 wagyu steak with her old boss Philip DeFranco, Reina Scully is eating her way through NYC's most decadent hunks of Japanese beef with a couple of friends. But what gives wagyu its famously marbled fat? And what's the deal with American wagyu popping up at restaurants?

programme.title: WWE Star Asuka Eats Japanese Eel
programme.desc: Eel is one of the most traditional ingredients in Japanese cooking. But in the U.S., the delicacy is still largely misunderstood. On this episode of Gochi Gang, Reina Scully is embarking on an eel-eating adventure. First, Chef Hiroki Fukushima gives Reina a crash course in the preparation of unagi, or freshwater eel, at Unagi Aburi Ittetsu. And later, Reina teams up with WWE superstar and sushi obsessive Asuka for an omakase experience centered around anago, unagi's saltwater cousin.

programme.title: Meek Mill & Lil Baby Albums, Jay Explains 'What's Free' Line, Em's 'Kick Off'
programme.desc: Nadeska, Wayno and DJ Akademiks review the latest projects released by Meek Mill and Lil Baby. After dropping 'Wins & Loses' in 2017, Meek returned last week with the release of his fourth studio album, 'Championships.' The new LP, which features a star-studded line-up of guest appearances, is highlighted by the Jay-Z and Rick Ross-assisted track, "What's Free," as well as the Drake and Meek collab joint "Going Bad.

programme.title: Kanye Still Obsessing About Drake, Bobby Shmurda Dropping a Tape From Prison?
programme.desc: On Tuesday's (Jan. 28) episode of #EverydayStruggle, Nadeska, Wayno and DJ Akademiks continue to mourn the loss of legendary basketball player Kobe Bryant, and his 13-year-old daughter Gianna Bryant. The crew shares the latest updates of the helicopter accident investigation, and also speak on 50 Cent announcing that Kobe's death has made him a changed man.

programme.title: The QueerX Awards
programme.desc: The circus is in town and just in time for National Coming Out Day! Welcome to the 2021 QueerX Awards brought to you by Lexus. Join us as hosts, Drew Droege and Raneir Pollard, take us on a carnival tour of LGBTQ music, films, and icons! Featuring appearances by Bowen Yang, Michaela Jaé Rodriguez, Patton Oswalt, Dwyane Wade, Erica Wheeler, and Elvira, Mistress of the Dark, Cassandra Peterson. And don't miss the special performances by Chanel and the Circus, Mila Jam, and Alsace Carcione.

programme.title: The Most Dangerous Year
programme.desc: As a dark wave of anti-transgender "bathroom bills" began sweeping across the nation, The Human Rights Campaign called 2016 the most dangerous year ever for transgender Americans. Filmmaker Vlada Knowlton captured the ensuing civil rights battle from the perspective of a group of embattled parents - including herself and her husband, parents of a young trans girl -- fighting to protect their children from discriminatory laws in their home state. While Knowlton passionately follows the story of anti-transgender legislation, the heart of the film lies in the stories of the families who accept and support their kids for exactly who they are.

programme.title: Why Can't I Be Me? Around You
programme.desc: Rusty Tidenberg, drag-racing aficionado, shocked friends and family by coming out as trans. Followed for 8 years by filmmaker Harrod Blank (son of Les Blank), Rusty guides us through the aftermath of her transition. Interwoven with lively tales of gender non-conforming individuals on the art-car circuit, Blank's film is a sensitive and unpredictable love letter to people who fight to be unapologetically themselves.

programme.title: Jobriath A.D.
programme.desc: Known as the first openly gay rock star, Jobriath's reign was a brief two years. Done in by over-hyped publicity, shunned by the gay community, and dismissed by critics, Jobriath retreated to the Chelsea Hotel, where he died forgotten, one of the earliest casualties of AIDS. But years later, new fans discover his music, and acts such as The Pet Shop Boys, Def Leppard, and Morrissey cite him as an influence. Experience the heartbreaking, unbelievable story of the one, the only, Jobriath.

programme.title: Wild Animal
programme.desc: Wild Animal is Melanie Vesey's debut comedy special and album. Blessed with some wild times, Melanie talks about her life after being shot by her cop x-girlfriend, having a baby with a Project Runway winner, getting gay married and raising a human son despite herself being a Wild Animal.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Twenty contestants take on one of television's largest and most extreme obstacle courses in order to win 10,000 pounds and get to 'The Final'.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Richard's co-host Amanda Byram is course-side in Buenos Aires as 20 foolhardy Brits tackle the purpose-built Argentinian course. There is a 10,000 pound prize for the winner and the additional plaudit of being crowned the Total Wipeout champion. To get there all the winner has to do is master the Sucker Punch, the Big Red Balls, Crash Mountain, Dizzy Dummies and the Wipeout Zone.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: In this episode, twenty intrepid contestants – male and female, young and old, fit and not-so-fit – take on four grueling, but wildly funny obstacle courses to win the title of the seventh Wipeout Champion and the grand cash prize.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Throughout this season, contestants have fallen, bounced and swung to win the prize, but only seven of them could achieve it. This is the last episode of the season and the seven previous winners compete to be crowned Champion of Champions. This time they face games like The Qualifier, The Crash Mountain, Dizzy Dummies and The Wipeout Zone.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: This is the 'Legends Special' and today all the worst but funniest competitors from the last three series have been invited back to have another go on the TV show. This time they have invited the 'Dodgeball Men' that appear during 'The Qualifier' game and, as you might remember, they throw dodgeballs at contestants while they attempt to cross the pontoons over water.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Richard Hammond presents the annual Total Wipeout trophy-athon where they celebrate the highs, the lows and the biggest splashes from the whole season. The presenter starts with the new 'Best Slip and Trip Award' and will be showing the top five, and the winner for each category. Don't miss this special episode!

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: In the first episode of season 3, Richard Hammond introduces a brand new challenge called Crash Mountain. This involves the twelve remaining contestants from round one standing on podiums over water while three robotic arms swing around in a circular motion to knock them off.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: This is the 'Last Chance Saloon' special's episode. Contestants take on four hard and tough games with the western films' sound effects and the accompaniment of Amanda Byram and Richard Hammond. They also welcome back favourites from the previous four series such as Man Mountain Syed, Rock God John and Total Wipeout's most famous couple 'Charlardo'.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Stand by for foam-padded action. It's another high-octane, low-pain-threshold edition of crazed knockabout game show Total Wipeout. Richard Hammond, as your host, will be arching an eyebrow at the ludicrous antics of 20 more over-excited contestants, who have thrown caution to the wind on Argentina's famous Total Wipeout course.

programme.title: In-Fisherman TV:Parade of Impressive Sportfish
programme.desc: The In-Fisherman staff takes you into the field to fish for some of North America’s most impressive sportfish, as they use compact lures to extract largemouths from icy waters, roll into action for Great Lakes bad boys, both trout and salmon, and fish for late-season walleyes in beast mode.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Best Boat:Arrowglass 24, Sea Born SX281, Belzona 40CCâ¨
programme.desc: Today, on Florida Sportsman Best Boat...For anglers and their families who are interested in adventuring outside of the inlet, we will be taking a look at the Arrowglass 248 CC If you are serious about offshore fishing, but require comfort for the family, we'll be taking a look at the Sea Born SX281 Offshore For serious boaters who want to enjoy time on the water, but not give up the ability to fish, we will be taking a look at Belzona 40CC.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Project Dreamboat:39’ Sea Vee Intro, Custom-Built Conchfish
programme.desc: Two Rivers Boatworks takes on repairing and fully-customizing a 39 Sea Vee George LaBonte joins dreamboat owner Angelo Genovese aboard his custom built Conchfish 16 and....Wildfire Marine continues work on the 23 Seacraft.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Watermen:Florida Bay and the need for freshwater.
programme.desc: Capt Sam Atwell fishes with Capt Mark Krowka in Florida bay for a day of excitement.

programme.title: Greg McHale's Wild Yukon:OA-GMH-LC1904
programme.desc: Mountain caribou country is some of the most beautiful the Yukon has to offer. A September hunt sees Greg and his former adventure racing teammate Travis working through the real challenges of remote mountain hunting.

programme.title: Shankfest 5 Part 2
programme.desc: Shankfest 5 Group 2 arrives in camp to Choctaw Hunting Lodge with more hogs and rams on the menu.

programme.title: Gun Stories:21st Century Pistol Designs
programme.desc: Joe Mantegna explores the surge of pistols based on the AR and AK platforms.

programme.title: Zona's Awesome Fishing Show:Phil Marks - Texas
programme.desc: Phil Marks is arguably one of the best anglers in the state of Texas and that is no small statement. When he and Z get together they morph into quite the team. Throw them on some summertime water in East Texas and they are going to do some damage.

programme.title: In-Fisherman TV:Roads Less Traveled
programme.desc: The In-Fisherman staff searches out out-of-the way and overlooked options for exciting fishing, as they travel to pits and ponds for bullheaded bluegills, use Euro tackle and tactics to catch bulldozer carp, and slip into high gear with over-the-top tactics for largemouth bass.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Best Boat:Ranger 2260 Bay, Grady 251 CE, Glasstream 360 SCX
programme.desc: Today, on Florida Sportsman Best Boat...If you are looking for a solid, well-designed fishing platform, that offers stylish and functional features, we will be taking a look at the Ranger 2260 Bay In search of a versatile boat that handles both inshore and offshore conditions with ease? If so, we will be taking a look at the Grady White 251 Coastal Explorer Looking for a FAST boat that delivers style, function and fishability? If so, we'll be taking a look at Glasstream 360 SCX.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Project Dreamboat:43 L&H Underway Classic 23 Seacraft Splash
programme.desc: L&H Boats begins production on hull number one of their brand new 43 George LaBonte joins John McCormick aboard his 1972 24 Pro-Line the experts at TRB tackle installing a very custom, one-off dash panel in the 25 Contender project and...finally complete...we meet with Cory Fountain, owner of the classic 23 Seacraft transformed at Wildfire Marine, for a day on the water in Savanna, Georgia.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Watermen:Crystal River Grouper Madness with Capt Dan Clymer
programme.desc: Crystal River is known for its beautiful spring fed river systems with an old Florida feeling. What Capt Sam Atwell finds out is they also have an incredible shallow water Grouper fishery.

programme.title: Gun Stories:Guns Of The New Americans
programme.desc: Joe Mantegna travels to Krebs, Oklahoma to visit the land his grandfather purchased in 1905 and fire the 1897 Winchester that belonged to his grandfather.

programme.title: Zona's Awesome Fishing Show:Drew Benton- Seminole
programme.desc: This season of ZAFS has been a test, every show was hard earned. It should come as no surprise that it would wrap up the same way. Z heads south to Georgia's Lake Seminole to meet up with Bassmaster Drew Benton, who knows these stomping grounds like the back of his hand. Of course they will roll out just ahead of a massive polar vortex. But, like this season, sometimes the greatest tests have the best payoff.

programme.title: In-Fisherman TV:Parade of Impressive Sportfish
programme.desc: The In-Fisherman staff takes you into the field to fish for some of North America’s most impressive sportfish, as they use compact lures to extract largemouths from icy waters, roll into action for Great Lakes bad boys, both trout and salmon, and fish for late-season walleyes in beast mode.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Project Dreamboat:OA-FPD-LC0413
programme.desc: Two Rivers Boatworks freshens up a boat of their own, a very-customized Intrepid George LaBonte revisits some of his favorite One-Man Dreamboats from the season and Stuart Boatworks puts the finishing touches on their very custom 27.

programme.title: Black Cloud S1:E1 "Freelance Hunting the Dakotas"
programme.desc: Dr. Duck and Billy Campbell head north to the Dakotas to get a jump on the 2019 duck season with Ed McDonough and friends. Stale weather and too much water make field hunting a bust, but a cold front and a pothole covered in birds quickly changes the tempo and helps the crew ring in the new season in style.

programme.title: Black Cloud S1:E2 "Northern Green | Action Continues in the Dakotas | Black Cloud"
programme.desc: Dr. Duck and Billy Campbell continue their freelance trip in the Dakotas. There's an abundance of water, which has the mallards spread out in potholes and flooded fields. In this episode, a couple area students take advantage of a day off from school to share a memorable day in the field with the crew.

programme.title: Benelli Presents: Donnie Vincent’s Winds of Adak
programme.desc: In November of 2019, explorer and hunter Donnie Vincent traveled to Adak Island, Alaska. Located at the westernmost end in the Aleutian chain, Adak is wilderness with the exception of a now-abandoned naval base that once housed more than 6,000 people. Winds of Adak chronicles Donnie’s exploration of the island, a hauntingly desolate abandoned military outpost and three unique hunts—caribou, ptarmigan and sea ducks—as the unforgiving elements, the terrain and the Bering Sea test both man and equipment.

programme.title: The Raven Project S1:E1 "Raven Show One Alpha"
programme.desc: From the ground up host Randy Birdsong will take you through the trials and tribulations of owning his first farm and grooming it to be one of the best whitetail hunting properties in the country

programme.title: The Raven Project S1:E2 "Last Ditch Effort"
programme.desc: With everything breaking down Dustin and Randy head to an auction to hopefully save their weekend plans of getting seed into the ground.

programme.title: The Raven Project S1:E3 "We Got 99 Problems"
programme.desc: It seems that anything that can go wrong will go wrong on The Raven. Randy and Dustin are trying to beat the weather and get and the projects buttoned up before the September opener.

programme.title: Road Trips S1:E5 "Chasing a Milk River Giant | Bowhunting Montana Whitetails"
programme.desc: Tyler Jordan heads to Montana, which is one of his favorite trips of the year. The Milk River is a very special place to the Realtree crew, and it doesn't take long before they spot a giant. Will they close the distance? Find out now.

programme.title: Road Trips S1:E6 "Legendary Whitetail Falls | Spot and Stalking on the Milk River"
programme.desc: Tyler Jordan heads back to the Milk River in hopes of catching up with a buck they call “Hightower." After spotting the buck from 400 yards away, Jordan decides to plan a spot-and-stalk effort to get in range of it. Crawling through the snow in frigid temperatures proved the right decision, and was well worth it.

programme.title: WPT Greatest Season 1 Episode 20
programme.desc: World Poker Tour ignited the global poker boom with a unique television show based on a series of high-stakes tournaments. WPT events turned Gus Hansen into the Great Dane and Daniel Negreanu into Kid Poker, and created dozens of poker-made millionaires.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 1
programme.desc: There’s a new stop on The World Poker Tour as the eleventh season kick starts its first televised event in ‘The City of Brotherly Love’. Each one of these young East Coast pros aims to have their name engraved on the WPT Champions cup and be immortalized forever. One of the oldest on the final table, twenty-seven year old Stephen Reynolds, starts as chip-leader but any one of the six youngsters could be the winner tonight. Kimberly Lansing anchors the action while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten bring you the dynamic play by play from the Parx Open Poker Classic.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 2
programme.desc: WPT’s coverage of the Parx Open Poker Classic continues with more nonstop action from the felt where five players are left to fight it out for a spot on the prestigious Champions Cup. Off the felt Tony Dunst brings us more in-depth analysis in another edition of The Raw Deal and we take a look back at one of the best moments from season ten the race to become Player of the Year. Kimberly Lansing anchors while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten call the plays at the Parx Casino.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 3
programme.desc: It’s down to the final three in the first WPT title of season eleven and there is everything to play for on the felt with a spot on the prestigious Champions Cup at stake. None of these young east coast pros look close to wavering but it is only a matter of time, skill and luck, before the winner is determined. Commentators Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten bring you all the twists and turns in the thrilling conclusion to the Parx Open Poker Classic.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 4
programme.desc: The Legends of Poker is under way and tensions are racking up early in this historic second decade of the World Poker Tour. In his very first WPT event the lone amateur on the felt, Josh Hale, has surmounted a staggering chip-lead but with five talented pros each as eager for the victory, the illustrious Champions Cup could find itself in anyone’s hands. Kimberly Lansing anchors the action while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten bring you the energetic play by play from the tournament that is just too good to miss.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 5
programme.desc: There are even more twists and turns to be had at the Bicycle Casino where the players’ chip counts rise and fall with dramatic consequences. So far only one player has been eliminated and so five remain to fight for the chance to have their name engraved on the prestigious WPT Champion’s Cup. Off the felt anchor Kimberly Lansing takes a look at previous and current player of the year contenders while poker Hall of Famer Mike Sexton and Hollywood’s own Vince Van Patten guide us though the play to determine the WPT “legend of poker”.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 6
programme.desc: The Legends of Poker is coming to its thrilling conclusion in the third and final hour of WPT’s extended coverage at the Bicycle Casino. There have been some daring plays but it’s time to see whose gamble will pay off on this rollercoaster of a final table. Tony Dunst breaks it down in The Raw Deal while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten bring us all the surprises in the final hands of this exhilarating competition.

programme.title: Part 1 - 43rd Annual World Figure 8 Championship - Indianapolis, IN
programme.desc: Part 1 of the 43rd Annual World Figure 8 Championship from the Indianapolis Speedrome.

programme.title: RaceMax Motorsports: Rd 2 - Brent Car Endurance Championship
programme.desc: This week we're at the Silverstone Circuit in Northamptonshire for Round 2 of the Brent Car Endurance Championship

programme.title: RaceMax Motorsports: Rd 2 - Ferrari Challenge & FIA Karting Euro
programme.desc: This week we look at the FIA Karting European Championship in Salbri, France. Also, we bring highlights from Round 2 of the Ferrari Challenge at Silverstone in the UK.

programme.desc: Lucas Oil Off Road Racing Series: 2018 - Turbo UTV/Pro 2-Rd 9 - Glen Helen. Event Date: 9/21/18

programme.title: Terracross: 2017 - Elk River, MN - Part 2
programme.desc: Pro Women XP 1000, Pro AM 1000, Celebrity X Turbo, and Shootout Women vs Pro AM from ERX Motorsports Park - Elk River, MN. Event Date: 10/21/17

programme.title: Installing an Aluminum Bed Floor Kit in a Chevy C10
programme.desc: Our Lo ‘n Slo, C10 project breaks tradition by ditching its rotted wood bed floor for an easy install aluminum kit that mimics the real thing. Plus, the guys in Engine Power explode our 292 straight-six for a full rebuild.

programme.title: Rebuild or Buy: Pros and Cons of a Powerstroke Failure
programme.desc: Rebuild or buy? This is Austin’s diesel dilemma after his daily driver breaks down in the driveway. Plus Dragonali, our ’11 Denali HD gets traction bars and fender clearance for bigger wheels & tires.

programme.title: Duramax Diesel Fuel Upgrades for High Performance
programme.desc: Dragonali’s Duramax gets a lift pump to handle higher horsepower. And our ’65 C10 Lo ‘n Slo is back with the rebuilt 292 straight-six. It’s fitted on the Engine Power dyno for some initial pulls.

programme.title: Duramax Diesel Teardown and Upgrade to 1000 Horsepower
programme.desc: We take apart our 6.6L Duramax from our ’11 Denali HD for an upgrade to 1000HP. Plus, we meet a diesel junkie who built a Cummins powered Ford Ranger pocket rocket for the dragstrip.

programme.title: The Unbreakable Suburban is Going Off Road
programme.desc: The guys put Project Unbreakable, our ’91 Chevy Suburban, to the test at Adventure Off Road Park! From trails to mud we’ll see it all! Plus, we’re off to a viewer’s house to rescue the interior of her 1966 Chevy C10.

programme.title: Jeep Wagoneer Transformed: “TrashHawk” Hits The Track
programme.desc: After completing final work on our TrackHawk inspired 1986 Jeep Wagoneer we call TrashHawk, it’s time for some high performance fun at the National Corvette Museum Motorsports Park track.

programme.title: First Gen Bronco Gets a Modern Suspension
programme.desc: Our ’74 Bronco build is getting a suspension overhaul plus new axles, brakes, wheels and tires! And John Kramen from Mecum Auctions stops by to check on the progress.

programme.title: Mocking Up a New 1974 Bronco
programme.desc: It’s time to mock everything in place in our 1974 Bronco. We’ll also have the frame blasted and powder coated, the body in epoxy, and assembled to the frame.

programme.title: GMC Sierra Old School Build
programme.desc: We buy a ’02 Sierra on the cheap and turn it into a reliable, powerful daily driver. First a leveling kit, wheels, and tires for a brand new stance.

programme.title: Adding Posi-traction to our ’02 Old School Sierra
programme.desc: We trash the factory Gov-lock rear for a true posi to get both tires spinning. Plus suspension upgrades and a classic throwback exhaust continue our retro build.

programme.title: ’65 C10 Wrap Up
programme.desc: After a year in the shop, the turbo powered 292 straight-six is broken in and hits the road and the track for a run down the 1/8th mile drag strip. Plus we rescue a Toyota Tundra in need of accessories.

programme.title: Leveling Kit ’02 Old School Sierra
programme.desc: Transformation of our throwback Sierra continues with a lift kit, 33” tall tires, and a tune-up before we hit the trail for some wheelin’ in the country.

programme.title: Building a Chevy 292 Inline Straight-Six
programme.desc: We build a hot rod 292 Chevy straight-six that puts power to the pavement for Truck Tech’s 1965 C10.

programme.title: Boosting a Chevy 292 Inline Straight-Six
programme.desc: The straight-six engine gets a big horsepower boost with a custom-designed turbo setup.

programme.title: Adding a Tunnel Ram to a 408 Windsor
programme.desc: Ford’s Windsor powerplant becomes the second engine for our mobile chassis dyno. Plus: we visit this year’s PRI event in Indianapolis.

programme.title: Installing an Old School Blower on a Small Block 383 Stroker
programme.desc: The crew from Carcass needs plenty of power to move their 1-ton military truck. Our answer: supercharge a 383 ci V8!

programme.title: Turbocharged Ford 300
programme.desc: Ford’s inline six industrial engine gets what you’ve been asking for...a turbo!

programme.title: BBQ Thighs and Fried Peach Pies
programme.desc: Julia Collin Davison unveils the secrets to the ultimate Barbecue Chicken Thighs to host, Bridget Lancaster. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of popcorn. And finally, test cook Bryan Roof demonstrates how to make Fried Peach Pies at home.

programme.title: Spaghetti House Classics
programme.desc: Test cook Christie Morrison makes host Julia Collin Davison the perfect Hearty Beef Lasagna. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a tasting of block mozzarella. And finally, test cook Lan Lam makes Bridget a new weeknight favorite-Chicken Scarpariello.

programme.title: Summer Steak and Salad
programme.desc: Test cook Christie Morrison makes host Bridget Lancaster the ultimate Grilled Thick-Cut Porterhouse Steaks. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried shows host Julia Collin Davison his top pick for paring knives. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of crumbled blue cheese. And finally, test cook Lan Lam makes Julia the best Caesar Green Beans.

programme.title: A Spanish Affair
programme.desc: Host Julia Collin Davison reveals the secrets to making the best Paella on the Grill with host Bridget Lancaster. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews Paella Pans in the Equipment Corner. Finally, test cook Dan Souza shows Julia how to make the ultimate Patatas Bravas at home.

programme.title: Seafood Supper
programme.desc: Host Julia Collin Davison reveals the steps for making perfect Pan-Seared Salmon. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop conducts a tasting of fish sauce. Then, science expert Dan Souza demonstrates the differences between wild and farmed salmon. Finally, test cook Elle Simone shows Julia the secrets to making the ultimate Shrimp Scampi.

programme.title: Barbecued Pork and Braised Tofu
programme.desc: Hosts Bridget Lancaster and Julia Collin Davison make Chinese-style barbecued pork. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top picks for wire racks and rimmed baking sheets. Finally, test cook Dan Souza makes Julia mapo tofu.

programme.title: Cornish Hens and Pita on the Grill
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster prepare gai yang. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop conducts a tasting of tahini. Next, gadget critic Lisa McManus reviews grill tongs. And finally, test cook Dan Souza makes Bridget arayes.

programme.title: The Perfect Cake
programme.desc: Bridget and Julia make the perfect Gingerbread Layer Cake and Keith Makes Sticky Toffee Pudding Cakes.

programme.title: Spring Dinner for Company
programme.desc: In this episode, test cook Becky Hays makes Julia the perfect Roasted Whole Side of Salmon. Tasting expert Jack Bishop conducts a turmeric tasting, gadget critic Lisa McManus reviews kids' vegetable peelers, and science expert Dan Souza explains the magic of emulsions. Finally, Dan makes the best recipe for Buttery Spring Vegetables.

programme.title: Pork Chops, Two Ways
programme.desc: Pork chops are leaner than they used to be, which poses new problems for home cooks. We explain which chops to buy and how to cook them, ensuring perfectly cooked meat that is both crispy and juicy.

programme.title: Dressing Up Vegetables
programme.desc: We wanted to upgrade two favorite fancy vegetable dishes: twice-baked potatoes and stuffed bell peppers.

programme.title: Maple-Glazed Pork Roast
programme.desc: Pork producers have worked so hard to remove fat from their pigs that most pork roasts have little character. Glazing a pork roast with maple syrup is an attractive way to boost flavor, but all too often the meat becomes sweet and candylike. We wanted to perfect this recipe.

programme.title: Chicken in a Pot
programme.desc: French country cooking has a way with chicken in a pot, whether it's the famous chicken with 40 cloves of garlic or the lesser-known chicken Provençal. These dishes take chicken to new heights-or go awry.

programme.title: Simple Soups
programme.desc: Most cooks are under the impression that good soup takes all day to prepare. Maybe that's what our mothers wanted us to think, but the truth is that homemade soup need not be a complicated affair. We'll show you how to make simplified versions of two favorite soups: chicken noodle and Italian pasta and bean.

programme.title: Pork Chops and Gravy
programme.desc: It sometimes seems the simplest recipes suffer the worst fate in modern cookbooks. Maybe it's because no one really cares enough about these dishes to get them right. The test kitchen was committed to breathing new life into these old-fashioned American recipes: stuffed pork chops, gravy, and glazed carrots.

programme.title: Tex-Mex Favorites
programme.desc: In this episode we look at a few of our favorite Tex-Mex dishes: tomato salsa, quesadillas, and beef tacos.

programme.title: High-Roast Chicken Dinner
programme.desc: There are certain dinners we rely on again and again. Take roast chicken and potatoes. It's simple, yet satisfying. We are particularly fond of roasting the chicken and potatoes together in one pan. While the chicken roasts, its juices drip onto the potatoes, giving them a wonderfully rich crust and creamy flavor.

programme.title: Julia & Jacques Cooking at Home - Desserts
programme.desc: Jacques and Julia create some very special desserts in this colorful episode. Poires Belle Helene - poached pear perched atop pound cake drizzled with chocolate sauce sweet creamy rich and delicious Strawberries Sabayon and Crepes Suzette, classically flambéed and served with orange butter and powdered sugar, as well as a Hungarian inspired torta of layered crepes baked with raspberry jam.

programme.title: Cucina Amore - Ginger Tuna
programme.desc: Extra simple, pan-seared tuna steaks with flavorful butter-lemon-ginger sauce colorful layered baked vegetables with a touch of mustard and rustic plum tart in phyllo pastry.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table - Meals in a Minute
programme.desc: Pati is a busy mom on the go. If you’re a mom who likes to cook for your family and take your kids to school, practice and everywhere else, you need a few quick and easy meals in your arsenal. Pati’s oldest sister Karen, who has older kids, shares a few tips as they visit her restaurant in Mexico City. Then, back at home, Pati shows us some of her go-to weekly dishes.

programme.title: The Kitchen Wisdom of Cecilia Chiang - A Legend Is Born
programme.desc: Cecilia Chiang was born almost 100 years ago in a China that no longer exists. In this episode, viewers get an overview of her amazing story from Beijing to San Francisco.

programme.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen - A Dish to Name
programme.desc: Chef Stellino explores how to properly make and name a dish for someone special. Dishes Include: Maureen's Farro Salad / Gambero al Coccio (Shrimp in the shell cooked in wine) / Grandma's Braciole /Aunt Buliti's Strawberries ( a special twist on a fresh fruit cup featuring strawberries and oranges with a very special sauce).

programme.title: Ciao Italia - Potato Ravioli / I Ravioli di Patate
programme.desc: Mary Ann celebrates Tuscany’s distinctive regional dishes when she prepares Tortelli di Patate alla Mugellina a potato-filled ravioli drizzled in a butter and sage sauce. Then she makes life easy in the kitchen by grabbing some egg roll wrapper, potatoes and spinach to create East meets West Won Ton Tortelli.

programme.title: Martin Yan's Chinatowns - Chinatown Markets
programme.desc: Martin tours the Chinatown Markets in San Francisco. Then he enjoys a meal at the Pearl City Restaurant owned by his friends Mr. And Mrs. Kin-Fai Chan. This episode's recipes include: Drunken Shrimp Soup, Four-Mushroom Beef, and Five-Flavour Chicken and Eggplant.

programme.title: Primal Grill - Primal Grill For A Crowd
programme.desc: Cook indoors and you often cook solo. Light a grill and you cook for a crowd. This show focuses on grilling for parties.

programme.title: Michael Chiarello's Napa - Panzanella
programme.desc: Italians make this bread and vegetable salad in the summer with fresh tomatoes and garlic. We show how to make it all year long, with a springtime asparagus panzanella, a classic summer version, and with veal medallions to serve as a main course. We'll tour Main Street, St. Helena, and see some of the valley's most charming stores and restaurants.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table - Lamb Chops & Scaffata
programme.desc: Lidia Matticchio Bastianich cooks a universal favorite, marinated lamb chops, served with a memorable sauce, prepared with fresh mint leaves, wine, stock, citrus juices and herbs. The lamb is served with scaffata -- spring legumes simmered slowly – along with crispy, golden roasted potato wedges.

programme.title: Infusion - Birds
programme.desc: Today on Infusion, we look at the way various poultry are used in cooking.

programme.title: Julia & Jacques Cooking at Home - Desserts
programme.desc: Jacques and Julia create some very special desserts in this colorful episode. Poires Belle Helene - poached pear perched atop pound cake drizzled with chocolate sauce sweet creamy rich and delicious Strawberries Sabayon and Crepes Suzette, classically flambéed and served with orange butter and powdered sugar, as well as a Hungarian inspired torta of layered crepes baked with raspberry jam.

programme.title: Cucina Amore - Ginger Tuna
programme.desc: Extra simple, pan-seared tuna steaks with flavorful butter-lemon-ginger sauce colorful layered baked vegetables with a touch of mustard and rustic plum tart in phyllo pastry.

programme.title: What's For Dinner? Curry Vegetable Soup
programme.desc: Ken and Mary Jo have a fun time in the kitchen cooking curry vegetable soup, plus a few other excellent dishes.

programme.title: Dine & Dish Nation - The Best of Dine & Dish Nation #1
programme.desc: Host Kam Carman welcomes Pierre Binandeh, Tracie Ginster, and Marcel Sanders, who review signature dishes from the Grey Ghost Steakhouse and sumptuous soups and hearty sandwiches at the Russell Street Deli also Chris Guyor, Nailah Ellis-Brown and Niki Calme, who review sophisticated specialties at the Prime & Proper Steakhouse.

programme.title: Chefs A' Field: Green Cuisine - King of Alaska
programme.desc: The mighty Yukon River is the longest river in Alaska and the third longest in North America. Its 2300‐mile stretch of pristine glacier‐fed waters holds the most legendary and mystical salmon in the world‐ the Yukon River King Salmon. In this episode, master seafood chef Rick Moonen ventures to this remote region to meet what he calls, “The best fish I ever ate.”

programme.title: Superfoods with Chef Walter Staib - Soy
programme.desc: Chef Staib prepares a Breaded Tofu Florentine, and a Tofu & Roasted Beet Salad.

programme.title: Great Chefs of America: John Pence, Roger Kaplan, and Marty Blitz
programme.desc: Recipes included with this episode: Sweetbreads with Balsamic Mustard Demi-glace, Pan-fried Soft-shell Crabs with Lobster Slaw, and Mojo Sabayon with Brazilnut-Phyllo Basket. Restaurants include: Westmoreland Bistro in Portland, City Grill in Atlanta, and Mise en Place in Tampa.

programme.title: The Da Vinci List Chefs - The Da Vinci List Chefs
programme.desc: Meet the modern culinary artists who have transformed their fields.

programme.title: In Search of Food S01 E01 - Minnesota
programme.desc: Promotional Content

programme.title: In Search of Food - New York
programme.desc: Barton explores an Upper East Side locovore restaurant and walks through an Italian market looking for fresh pasta.

programme.title: Travel Man - Barcelona
programme.desc: Richard and actor Kathy Burke do Barcelona in 48 hours, including some far-out cuisine, Cava tasting, a guided tricycle tour and surrealist artist Miro.

programme.title: Travel Man - Istanbul
programme.desc: Richard and comedian Adam Hills embark on a whirlwind visit in Istanbul, including a boat trip, a massage, a very close shave, and some haggling at the Grand Bazaar.

programme.title: Travel Man - Iceland
programme.desc: Richard takes actor Jessica Hynes on a whirlwind weekend away to the stunning scenery of Iceland, for waterfalls, glaciers, geysers, whales, rotten shark and elf school.

programme.title: Travel Man - Marrakech
programme.desc: Richard and actor Stephen Mangan eat steamed sheep's head and go hot air ballooning and camel riding on a quickie weekend trip in Morocco.

programme.title: Travel Man - Vienna
programme.desc: Richard goes to Vienna with comedian Chris O'Dowd to sample the sausages, cakes, wines and spirits. The pair also take a hot-rod tour, visit a fairground, the Freud museum and the city sewers.

programme.title: Travel Man - Paris
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade and Mel Giedroyc do a Paris le weekend, with snails, absinthe, a cordon bleu cookery course, bespoke perfume and an art tour.

programme.title: Travel Man - Copenhagen
programme.desc: Comedian Noel Fielding joins Richard for 48 fast and funny hours in the Danish capital, with cycling, sightseeing, art, sandwiches, beer and rollercoasters.

programme.title: Travel Man - Moscow
programme.desc: Richard and Greg Davies attempt to extract the essence of Moscow in two days, as they clash with army tanks, head into space and visit one of the strangest circuses in the world.

programme.title: Travel Man - Seville
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade heads to southern Spain with comedian Rob Delaney from Catastrophe, where they eat tapas, learn to dance flamenco and go a bit Wild West.

programme.title: Travel Man - Venice
programme.desc: Richard and Jo Brand do a fast, funny and ruthlessly efficient trip to Venice, learning to row a gondola, sampling Venetian tapas, and staying at the famous Hotel Danieli.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations - Macau

programme.title: Flipping Vegas:Dream House
programme.desc: Scott Yancey takes on the biggest flip of his career -- an unfinished, multimillion-dollar Vegas mansion that could make him or break him.

programme.title: Flipping Vegas:Chop House
programme.desc: Scott's latest flip seems like another potential cash cow for a modest home on a public golf course, until he and project manager Baldemar find out this junker was formerly being used as a chop shop junkyard.

programme.title: Flipping Boston:Stink House
programme.desc: Pete and Dave work with the Massachusetts Attorney General's office.

programme.title: Flipping Boston:Dave's Design Dilemma
programme.desc: Pete and Dave go in on a new construction house that the previous owners were unable to finish. The buy is in a great sea-side town and has minimal work left to be done, but when Dave disagrees with Pete s design plans, this simple flip is thrown off course. An argument over the deck sends Dave over the edge. He wants his vision to be heard, and the only way to prove himself is to take over the design and leave Pete to the project managing. Will the duo succeed or will this flipping experiment blow up in their faces?

programme.title: Flipping Boston:Stinks to High Heaven
programme.desc: Pete strikes a deal to renovate and sell his friend Thanasi s home. The huge house needs only cosmetic attention and promises big profits--if Pete can keep Dave from scaring off Thanasi, who happens to be a mild-mannered priest. But once construction begins, this dream flip turns into a holy nightmare. They discover mold and foundation cracks on day one, and things go from bad to worse when a failed septic system tests the limits of Dave s delicate stomach. Pete and Dave have to think big to dig their way out of this financial hole and pray the house will sell and sell fast.

programme.title: Flipping Boston:Dave's Quick Flip
programme.desc: Winter is approaching and Dave doesn't want to spend it flipping an old lady house with a leaky roof so he persuades Pete to take on a quick condo flip instead. Pete's jaw hits the floor when he see the tiny space--it's only 350 square feet! But once the creative juices start to flow Pete has visions of turning the boxy studio into a sleek bachelor pad with all mod cons. The boys set the clock for one week but the tight quarters prove challenging for the big personalities on Pete and Dave's crew. While Dave is busy scheming to off-load the old lady house tempers start to fray at the condo and soon the sparks are flying. Can Pete and Dave hold the crew together long enough to get their bachelor pad on the market?

programme.title: Flipping Vegas:Flood House
programme.desc: Expert real estate investor, Scott Yancey, attempts to flip a flooded house in a gated Las Vegas neighborhood, but a dangerous discovery threatens to break his budget.

programme.title: Sell This House!:Jersey City, NJ
programme.desc: Arthur and Katie are ready to retire and move on to a home in Arizona. They have had their two bedroom townhome on the market for over six months with no interest what so ever. The place is boring and very outdated. Buyers are turned off and don't even remember going through the house. Designer and staging expert Roger Hazard helps Arthur and Katie do a total home staging makeover. Roger removes over half their furniture and sends it off to storage. Painting the bland white walls with a new coat of paint along with a dark accent wall makes the place contemporary and a stand-out for buyers. Roger had our homeowners do several projects including artwork for the dining room wall. Their home sold the day after we left! And, as part of the deal, the buyers wanted Arthur and Katie's Masterpiece included.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen

programme.title: Hard Knocks: archivo de peleas
programme.desc: La escuela de Hard Knocks te presenta peleadores profesionales y amateurs de Norte América peleando en la jaula.

programme.title: Muchachos Impacientes
programme.desc: Varios cantantes rivales se unen en un espectáculo a beneficio.

programme.title: El Turista
programme.desc: Desde el campamento base del Everest hasta el desierto australiano, a través de la Patagonia o al ritmo lento del Transmongoliano, el Turista es un programa producido y presentado por Cesar Sar, quien viaja por todo el mundo a través de un gran número de países durante más de 400 días y donde nos presenta sus aventuras, nos da consejos, comparte historias y nos enseña eventos curiosos que suceden a lo largo del camino. Catorce horas de televisión con más de 260 historias cortas que saltan de un punto a otro del planeta.

programme.title: Fallaste Corazón
programme.desc: El albañil Lupe vive con su esposa Lidia y su hija Toñita.

programme.title: Detrás De Las Cámaras
programme.desc: Programa de investigación narrado por personajes que han marcado el mundo del entretenimiento venezolano. Acompáñenos a revivir las experiencias y anécdotas más memorables.

programme.title: Seis y Medio
programme.desc: Un hombre y una mujer debaten, se sorprenden, descubren y filosofan sobre el amor desde una novedosa posición: desde la altura de un 6,5. Es una reflexión con ironía y sin complejos que nace de una pareja surgida de los restos de dos relaciones anteriores mal terminadas y aún no olvidadas. Entre discusiones y teorías sobre la vida, se destapan infidelidades, escriben cláusulas de obligado cumplimiento, definen mil conceptos relativos al amor, se aman concentrados activamente en sus anteriores amores… Una pareja a la que, extrañamente, le cuesta disolverse. ¿Quizás porque se quieren un seis y medio?

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Cada año cientos de mujeres caen en las redes de reclutadores que trafican con personas, viéndose forzadas a una vida de esclavitud sexual y laboral. Esta es la historia de Ana, Frida y Seleni, tres bellas jóvenes, engañadas bajo la promesa de alcanzar la vida soñada. Inocentes y vulnerables, con la férrea convicción de que pese a las condiciones adversas en las que viven, pueden alcanzar un mejor futuro, serán engañadas y utilizadas por personas inescrupulosas que las adentrarán en una red de prostitución de la que no podrán escapar.

programme.title: Muchachos Impacientes
programme.desc: Varios cantantes rivales se unen en un espectáculo a beneficio.

programme.title: Cartas A Elena
programme.desc: Un Joven Muchacho Es Adoptado Por El Cartero. Como Parte De Sus Tareas Diarias, Ellos No Solo Entregan El Correo Y Leen Las Cartas A Los Habitantes, También Toman Dictado Puesto Que La Mayoría Son Analfabetas. Un Día Teo Queda Lisiado Y Emilio Se Hace Cargo Del Correo Y Con Gran Imaginación, Cambia Las Cartas Por Historias Felices Y Optimistas. Durante Este Mismo Periodo, Emilio Conoce A Una Joven Chica Llamada Elena Y Juntos Viven Una Inocente Amistad Que Se Convierte En Su Primer Amor.

programme.title: Romance En Valentine
programme.desc: Kennedy Blaine, Hereda Un Rancho En El Pequeño Pueblo De Valentine En Nebraska. Antes De Vender La Propiedad, Pasara El Verano Allí Y Descubrira muchas Cosas Sobre Su Familia.

programme.title: Gemelos Sin Cura
programme.desc: Pedro y Pablo son dos hermanos gemelos. Pedro es un estafador. Pablo es un cura de barrio. Cuando a Pedro lo comienzan a perseguir por una gran deuda, él irá a la iglesia de su hermano para pedirle ayuda. Es así que ambos, por distintas situaciones, se verán obligados a suplantar la identidad del otro hasta encontrar solucionar sus problemas.

programme.title: Hemingway
programme.desc: El dueño del imperio editorial Hemingway muere, su familia lucha por obtener la herencia, pero antes deben resolver todos sus problemas.

programme.title: El Último Cuplé

programme.title: Cualquier Cosa Es Posible

programme.desc: Squad 5 is in shock due to Gun-woo's leave. Mu-won declares that he will do everything in his power to find Gun-woo, who disappeared with Kim Se-jin's group. Gun-woo begins trading with Kim Se-jin using information about Nam In-ho as bait and brings up stories from eight years ago that he never forgets. Squad 5, which was chasing after Gun-woo's traces, finally finds a decisive clue to where he is going.

programme.title: Hidden Identity EP10
